content:
Here's an expanded list of goods and services available in Kowloon Walled City, including brothels. Please note that the prices mentioned are approximate and might not be entirely accurate due to the informal nature of the economy. The prices are adjusted for inflation based on 2023 figures.

1. Food and drink:
a. Street food (e.g., noodles, dumplings, or rice dishes) - HKD 30-50 (USD 3.85-6.42)
b. Tea or soft drink at a local café - HKD 10-20 (USD 1.28-2.56)
c. Roasted meat or seafood dishes - HKD 50-100 (USD 6.42-12.82)
d. Traditional Chinese desserts - HKD 20-40 (USD 2.56-5.13)
e. Local bakery items (e.g., buns, pastries) - HKD 10-30 (USD 1.28-3.85)
2. Entertainment:
a. Entrance to a gambling den - HKD 100-300 (USD 12.82-38.46)
b. Visiting an arcade or games center - HKD 20-50 (USD 2.56-6.42)
c. Live performance or show at a small venue - HKD 50-150 (USD 6.42-19.23)
d. Participating in informal sporting events or games - HKD 20-50 (USD 2.56-6.42)
3. Accommodation:
a. Renting a small room for a night - HKD 150-300 (USD 19.23-38.46)
b. Shared dormitory-style lodging - HKD 100-200 (USD 12.82-25.64)
4. Services:
a. Basic haircut at a local barber - HKD 30-50 (USD 3.85-6.42)
b. Dental check-up at an unlicensed clinic - HKD 100-200 (USD 12.82-25.64)
c. Basic medical consultation at an unlicensed clinic - HKD 150-300 (USD 19.23-38.46)
d. Tailoring or clothing repair services - HKD 50-200 (USD 6.42-25.64)
e. Bicycle or motorcycle repair - HKD 50-300 (USD 6.42-38.46)
5. Shopping:
a. Handmade trinkets or souvenirs - HKD 20-100 (USD 2.56-12.82)
b. Clothing or textiles from local workshops - HKD 50-200 (USD 6.42-25.64)
c. Jewelry or accessories - HKD 50-500 (USD 6.42-64.10)
d. Electronics or appliances from informal retailers - HKD 100-1,000 (USD 12.82-128.20)
6. Brothels and adult entertainment:
a. Entrance fee for a brothel - HKD 200-500 (USD 25.64-64.10)
b. Service fee for a sex worker - HKD 500-2,000 (USD 64.10-256.40)

Please note that these goods and services were offered informally and may not have adhered to regulatory standards. Prices may have been negotiable depending on the specific circumstances and individual vendors.
